attributes.action: Create a national high Speed inetrnet Infrastructure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the complete failure of the market to provide a fibre optic internet backbone rsulting in over 40% of the population having no cable access it is about time the government stepped in and built a truly national cable network.
the benefits would be many and varied, from the creation of thousands of jobs during the construction to the benefits to companies outside the main urban ares being able to compete. It would also give a boost to new markets, such as online gaming, teleworking etc.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
